dashboard.label: HideADashboard
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_TiqkYNp2":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_testing"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"a","key":"row.a.value"},{"token":"b","key":"row.b.value"},{"token":"c","key":"row.c.value"}]}}]},"viz_vVd50pbm":{"type":"splunk.rectangle"},"viz_kUGPiXDT":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":""}},"viz_Q5wWD4ai":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"$a$
$b$
$c$
$makeResults:result.b$
"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_testing":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| makeresults 
| eval a="foo"
| eval b="$zzz$"
| eval c="huh"
| table a,b,c","enableSmartSources":true},"name":"makeResults"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_DClQnGRv":{"options":{"defaultValue":"Default Text","token":"zzz"},"title":"Text Input Title","type":"input.text"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_TiqkYNp2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":180,"h":90}},{"item":"viz_vVd50pbm","type":"block","position":{"x":590,"y":20,"w":330,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_kUGPiXDT","type":"block","position":{"x":330,"y":0,"w":240,"h":110}},{"item":"viz_Q5wWD4ai","type":"block","position":{"x":250,"y":10,"w":300,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_DClQnGRv"]},"description":"","title":"HideADashboard"}
